description: Style definitions for the interactive Tic Tac Toe frontend, including theme management and layout styling.

classes.name: .App
classes.description: Main application container styling with center alignment and theme-based background color.

classes.name: .App-header
classes.description: Header styling for the application, including flexbox properties for layout.

classes.name: .App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the application logo, including size and animation.

classes.name: .App-link
classes.description: Styling for links within the application, utilizing theme-based colors.

classes.name: .theme-toggle
classes.description: Styling for the theme toggle button, including hover and active states.
